info.name: shiftyy's MyAnimeList Dark+
info.description:
(Works only on MAL *PROFILE* page).

A simple dark recolor of mal profile page + some other design changes.

Features:
-Remove Ads
-Smaller "MAL" logo
-Customizable Background Color
-New Buttons Shape and Colors
-More Minimal menu postitions
-Remove RSS Feeds
-Hide "About Me" Section (Optional)

Feel free to give me feedback or report any bug/inconsistency in the comments!
